Key Match Events: Jordan Ayew scored a late goal in extra time to win the game for Ghana
Ernest Nuamah equalized for Ghana in the 57th minute
Kamoury Doumbia scored for Mali on the stroke of halftime
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ghana moved to second in the table with 6 points
Mali is now third with 4 points
Chad remains bottom of the group with zero points
Others: Ghana will face Central Africa Republic on Monday
The match was played in Bamako, Mali
